text: Bernice Cowton is a British water polo player. She competed for Great Britain in the 2003 World Aquatics Championships. She played for City of Sheffield Water Polo Club. == References == == Other websites == *water-polo-britain shutterstock *english-roses-european-masters-championships *world- championships-canada-beats-australia Category:British water polo players Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Bernice Cowton
